DOC.criteria: Depressive disorder Montgomery Asberg Rating Scale Score 20 p. Recent suicide attempt ( Treated inpatient due recent suicide attempt ) Informed consent Competence give inform consent Pregnancy Breastfeeding Serious somatic disease e.g . serious heart , vascular , hepatic , kidney , pulmonary , intestinal , endocrine , haematological neurological disease Ongoing substance abuse Schizophrenia psychotic disorder Ongoing psychosis Risk factor cardiovascular event Ulcer gastrointestinal bleeding Ongoing Electroconvulsive therapy Previous allergic reaction NSAID , acetylsalicylic acid , sulfonamides diclofenac sugar pill content Galactose intolerance , lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Ongoing treatment warfarin anticoagulant Ongoing treatment ACE inhibitor angiotensin II antagonist Ongoing treatment drug know effect immune system Ongoing treatment rifampicin , carbamazepine barbiturate
